```{r summary-1, echo=FALSE, fig.height=3.5, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(reshape2)

#project.id <- 'modeling.sirius'
file.evol = paste("", project.id, "_scm_evol.csv", sep="")
evol <- read.csv(file=file.evol, header=T)
evol <- evol[evol$repositories >= 1 & complete.cases(evol),]

evol.i <- data.frame(seq(1:nrow(evol)), evol[,c('date', 'authors','added_lines', 'removed_lines', 'commits', 'committers', 'repositories')])
names(evol.i)[1] <- 'index'

p <- plot_ly(data=evol.i, x=~index, y=~authors, text= ~paste('Date: ', date), 
		name="Authors", type='scatter', mode='lines', width=800, height=350)  %>% 
	add_trace(y=~added_lines, name='Added lines', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~removed_lines, name='Removed lines', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~commits, name='Commits', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~committers, name='Committers', mode='lines') %>% 
	add_trace(y=~repositories, name='repositories', mode='lines') %>% 
    layout(autosize = F,
		yaxis = list( title = "Value" ))

p
```
